description:
This online underwater photography course will teach you how to take amazing images underwater, by using your compact cameras (with a housing).

This course is designed to teach you the basics of underwater photography, even if you have little to no experience with it, to help create professional quality underwater images.

While there are plenty of underwater photography courses that focus on diving skills or how to use gear, it's hard to find a practical course like this one taught by a professional photographer, which is for beginner underwater photographers.

This course is designed for beginners with compact cameras who want to improve their skills and take stellar underwater images.

Regardless of what your level of experience is or what type of camera you use, this in-depth beginners course is designed to provide you with everything you need to take your underwater photography skills to the next level.

Whether you prefer taking photos of schools of fish, a nudibranch or divers, a great underwater photographer knows how to compose a shot, light it, and edit it. By honing these skills, you can create lifelong memories of your dives.

This course shows you how.

Unlike other underwater photography classes that are more focused on equipment and diving skills, this beginners course teaches you how to take amazing underwater photos.

Contents and Overview

This course is aimed at teaching underwater photographers what it takes to improve your composing techniques to make really good underwater pictures.

You'll start with the basics and understand underwater photography techniques and ideas, the opportunities available for creating extraordinary underwater pictures, and techniques you can follow to accomplishing your goals. You'll then dive into the different styles of underwater composition ideas you can focus on.

You'll learn about your camera settings, including how to shoot in manual mode. You'll use color balancing tools and master how to properly compose and light a scene. You'll even learn how to take great photos and how to edit images.
title: Take Amazing Underwater Pictures Using Compact Cameras
